name: Don't step the white tile with Tiny Frog
name_original: Don't step the white tile with Tiny Frog
description:
A tiny green frog hop off floating leaves to stay alive.

The gameplay is very easy: tap the screen with your fingers to make the little frog jump and use all your reflexes and promptness to jump as many leaves as possible. Each gameplay will last 15 seconds so your aim is to make a new record every time. Reach your maximum score in 15 seconds.

Remember that the little frog cannot maintain his life in water and as soon as he will touch water your game will be over and you have to start again.

You can decide the speed of the frog, just be careful not to let him jump in the water.

Very nice music, sound effects and animation when the frog jumps and when he touches water.

Once again redBit games chose pixel art with fresh and bright colours, a friendly character and a simple background.


Features:
- Addictive and fun
- for kids and adults
- gameplay of 15 seconds
- engaging music and sound effects
- play with one or more fingers
- animation

Support of Apple Game Center
